com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields

Class QueryField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields.QueryField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<QueryField>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRangeQueryField, QueryFieldDropdown, QueryFieldFullText, QueryFieldHasLigand, QueryFieldRuntimeDate, QueryFieldString

    public abstract class QueryField
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<QueryField>
    This class represents a single query field. A query comprises one or more groups, each comprising one or more fields and subgroups. All have an attribute (or id), a display name, a priority and a search group name (their parent menu category). Optionally they have a description and placeholder text. The latter is not used. Eventually, the plan is for the Node Description to be build dynamically and list the fields and their descriptions where available
    Since:
    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com

        protected QueryField setSubqueryNode(java.lang.String optionName,
                                     QueryFieldDropdown ddqf)
        Method to set the optional subquery (which always represents an enum)
        Parameters:
        optionName - The option name for the enum value of the subquery
        ddqf - The actual subquery - this is not displayed, but required for building the query, and provides the complete name of this parent field from one of it's values
        Returns:
        this field, for method call daisy-chaining

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getQuery(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger nodeIndex,
                                                        QueryFieldModel queryFieldModel)
        Method to get the RCSB guery JSON for the field and its QueryFieldModel representing an actual query using the field
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex - The incoming node index, as each node in the query has to be uniquely sequentially numbered
        queryFieldModel - The field model representing a query state for this field
        Returns:

                                                                            com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode node)
        This method builds a correctly formatted terminal node. The supplied ObjectNode becomes the terminal node
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex - The node index counter
        queryFieldModel - The QueryFieldModel to populate the correct parameters
        node - The JSON node which will become the required query terminal node
        Returns:
        The 'parameters' JSON node which will need the 'value' field added
